price: 102. ¡Ojalá tuviésemos otra oportunidad y regresásemos (a la vida mundanal)! Entonces seríamos creyentes”.
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
